name: Floating Island Saviours [Alpha]
description:
♡ Did you know that floating island can change? 

Floating Island Saviors is about the story of an aviator who crashed on a mysterious floating island that has the peculiarity of transforming itself every so often and that is attacked by some 'monsters'.

♡ Features
  • +Procedural levels.
  • ! Be carefull about geting many damage!
  • ! Buy items in the shop.
♡ Controls
  • Use [W][A][S][D] to move!
  • Space to put a landmine in the ground!
  • Right shift to change your weapon!
  • Left click to shoot!
  • Aim with the mouse!

Kill all the enemies, to win the level.

♡ Credits

    • Lian "Jhû" Grandon
    • Diego "Vermillion" Jorquera
  • Art and animation:
